title: Stellar Blade Weekly Pulse - Week 3
summary: This week saw intense discussions around the new dungeon update. While players love the challenge, there's growing concern about accessibility. The community remains highly engaged with 12K+ posts this week.

highlights.title: New Dungeon Divides Community
highlights.description: The latest dungeon content is praised for its design but criticized for extreme difficulty. 68% of discussions mention difficulty concerns.

highlights.title: Boss Fight Mechanics Win Hearts
highlights.description: Despite difficulty complaints, the new boss mechanics are universally praised. Players call it 'the best boss fight in recent gaming history.'

highlights.title: Reward System Under Scrutiny
highlights.description: Players feel the effort-to-reward ratio is unbalanced. This is becoming a trending topic across all platforms.

topIssues.title: Dungeon Difficulty Too High
topIssues.description: New dungeon content is inaccessible to casual players

topIssues.title: Reward Balance Concerns
topIssues.description: Players report insufficient rewards for difficulty level
